statements: SELECT * FROM property_tax_info
SELECT property_id, owner_name, assessed_value FROM property_tax_info
SELECT property_address, assessed_value FROM property_tax_info WHERE tax_rate > 0.2
SELECT owner_name, tax_rate FROM property_tax_info WHERE assessed_value > 500000
SELECT * FROM property_tax_info ORDER BY assessed_value DESC
SELECT * FROM property_tax_info WHERE assessed_value > 50000 ORDER BY assessed_value DESC
SELECT owner_name, assessed_value, tax_rate FROM property_tax_info WHERE owner_name LIKE 'John%'
SELECT property_id, property_address, assessed_value FROM property_tax_info WHERE tax_rate BETWEEN 0.1 AND 0.2
SELECT * FROM property_tax_info ORDER BY property_address ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT AVG(assessed_value) AS avg_assessed_value, MAX(tax_rate) AS max_tax_rate FROM property_tax_info
SELECT * FROM property_tax_information ORDER BY property_id DESC;
SELECT property_id, owner_name FROM property_tax_information WHERE property_value > 100000;
SELECT address FROM property_tax_information WHERE owner_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT property_id, property_value FROM property_tax_information WHERE property_value BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000;
SELECT owner_name, address FROM property_tax_information WHERE owner_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY address ASC;
SELECT * FROM property_tax_information WHERE property_value > 100000 ORDER BY property_value DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT property_id, address, owner_name FROM property_tax_information WHERE owner_name LIKE 'John%' AND property_value BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000 ORDER BY property_id;
SELECT property_type, AVG(tax_rate) AS avg_tax_rate FROM tax_rates GROUP BY property_type HAVING AVG(tax_rate) > 10 ORDER BY avg_tax_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM property_tax_information WHERE address LIKE '%Street' AND (owner_name = 'Alice' OR owner_name = 'Bob') ORDER BY address;

SELECT property_id, address, property_type, tax_rate FROM property_tax_information JOIN tax_rates ON property_tax_information.property_value * tax_rates.tax_rate > 50000 ORDER BY property_id ASC,tax_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM PropertyOwners;
SELECT owner_name, address FROM PropertyOwners;
SELECT property_id, property_address, property_type FROM Properties;
SELECT * FROM TaxRecords WHERE tax_year = 2021;
SELECT property_address, property_value FROM Properties WHERE property_type = 'House';
SELECT * FROM PropertyOwners WHERE owner_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT owner_name, address FROM PropertyOwners WHERE owner_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT property_type, property_address FROM Properties ORDER BY property_type DESC;
SELECT owner_id, owner_name, address FROM PropertyOwners JOIN Properties ON PropertyOwners.owner_id = Properties.owner_id;
SELECT tax_id, tax_amount, tax_year FROM TaxRecords WHERE tax_amount > 10000;
SELECT * FROM PropertyOwners;
SELECT owner_name, property_address FROM PropertyOwners WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT property_value, property_address FROM Properties WHERE property_type = 'commercial';
SELECT * FROM TaxRecords WHERE tax_year = 2021 ORDER BY tax_amount DESC;
SELECT assessor_name, contact_number FROM TaxAssessors WHERE area_served = 'CityA' ORDER BY assessor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM PropertyOwners WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT property_address, property_value FROM Properties WHERE property_type = 'House';
SELECT property_id, property_address, tax_amount FROM TaxRecords WHERE tax_year = 2021;
SELECT * FROM TaxAssessors WHERE area_served = 'City';

SELECT owner_name, property_address, property_value, tax_amount FROM PropertyOwners JOIN Properties ON PropertyOwners.property_id = Properties.property_id JOIN TaxRecords ON PropertyOwners.property_id = TaxRecords.property_id WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT owner_name, address FROM PropertyOwners
SELECT * FROM Properties WHERE property_type = 'House'
SELECT assessment_id, property_id, assessed_value FROM TaxAssessments ORDER BY assessed_value DESC
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM TaxPayments WHERE payment_amount > 1000
SELECT official_name, department FROM TaxOfficials
SELECT * FROM PropertyOwners WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT owner_name, phone_number FROM PropertyOwners WHERE owner_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Properties WHERE address LIKE '%Main Street%';
SELECT property_type, address FROM Properties ORDER BY property_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM TaxAssessments WHERE assessed_value > 10000 AND assessment_year = 2021;
